types.html:
n'y voir que du feu

  1. (dated) to see stars after receiving a physical blow
  2. (by extension) to be unable to see the finer details of a complex situation; (particularly) to fall for (a deception), to be taken in, to be totally hoodwinked
    Synonym: n'y voir que du bleu

Conjugation

[edit]
trans: to see stars after receiving a physical blow
to be unable to see the finer details of a complex situation
to fall for , to be taken in, to be totally hoodwinked
